name: Bunny (kaz01)
description:
A mini story and one way game where...

A child has lost her precious bunny. Help her find and bring back her bunny who got hypnotized in the portal!

(use the arrow keys to move)

- - - - - 

Sprites credits:

Floor map- The Tower of Druaga

Grass- Secret of Mana

Portal- Kingdom: Two Crowns

Bunny- Starbound

Characters- Dragon Quest 3 (JPN)
